name: Shooty Space Demo
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move and MOUSE to shoot.

P.S. FULLSCREEN is recommended for the best experience!

Based on an old real-time strategy game that I tried to make in my sophomore year of high school. All of the sprites are reused from that project.

This resurrected version is a top-down space shooter with an emphasis on physics, collisions, and satisfying explosions. I hope you enjoy it!

Please give me as much feedback as you want. Every critique is appreciated :)

This game is in progress. I'll be adding more features over time, including new ships, weapons, and game modes.
